title: What reality are you creating for yourself?
description: Reality isn't something you perceive; it's something you create in your mind. Isaac Lidsky learned this profound lesson firsthand, when unexpected life circumstances yielded valuable insights. In this introspective, personal talk, he challenges us to let go of excuses, assumptions and fears, and accept the awesome responsibility of being the creators of our own reality.
author: Isaac Lidsky
keywords: TED, talks, brain, choice, fear, humanity, identity, motivation, personal growth, success, blindness
